Name: Smart Gecko
About the game: Playing Action Puzzles like Smart Gecko reinforces the formation of new neurons, helping to improve your activities, mental alertness and improves your decision making. It increases your logic and reasoning capacity considerably. In addition to having fun playing, you can relieve your stress, improve your reflexes in a physical activity and make your daily tasks much more productive! Key Features: Action Puzzle! 60 challenging levels! Sokoban-like levels! NEW JigSaw Puzzle Mode! Keyboard or Mouse gameplay ! and more: NEW Level Tips! Immersive Soundtrack! History: In a research laboratory, one scientist in particular develops an experiment with a gecko, being one of the most agile and clever reptiles in its food chain. He trains his 'Tixaz' gecko in rooms designed to develop his abilities, and as reward and motivation, he gives him to eat special flies that give more intelligence Be the gecko, and show us how clever and fun your experience can be in the challenges that will be given to you.
